select last_insert_id()
insert into lego_order (gmt_create, gmt_modify, number, cost, product_id, address_id, user_id, size) values (#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update lego_order set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, number, cost, product_id, address_id, user_id, size from lego_order where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, number, cost, product_id, address_id, user_id, size from lego_order
